articles.content:
After a long hard winter of isolation, people in England were today finally free to meet friends and family outdoors, but they were last night warned against hugging.
Boris Johnson has urged Brits t… [+6107 chars]
articles.description: Boris Johnson has urged Brits to be cautious amid fears of a new Covid wave arriving from Europe and Government scientists warned that people still need to keep their distance from loved ones
articles.title: Hugging on hold as Boris Johnson warns of a third Covid wave as lockdown eases - Mirror Online

articles.description: While Leinster are almost unmatched in the Guinness Pro14, Stuart Lancaster says recent European setbacks are a great driver as the Irish province seeks to lay down a Champions Cup marker against Toulon on Friday.
articles.title: Lancaster wary of sub-conscious Leinster complacency - RTE.ie
